overview: Let’s go to Barcelona  Clea, the social media star and her friend Claire are ready to hit the road. All that's missing is the beautiful Cherry to complete the trio and officially launch the start of a road trip that promises to be very hot! Clea calls her friend Cherry to let her know that she has 20 minutes to finish getting ready, but what she doesn't know is that the pretty blonde is having sex with two guys and plans to enjoy it as much as possible! Under pressure of time, she asked her two lovers to take care of her at the same time. The two men rushed into it and fuck her without restraint in an intense threesome.
title: Road Trip
